data.title: Glenn Iwata
data.meta_description: Glenn Iwata is the Vice President of Enterprise Systems Integrations. He is responsible for flawless and frictionless implementation of artius.iD’s solutions for our emerging enterprise global client portfolio. Glenn works with large enterprise corporate teams both internally and externally to thoughtfully and rapidly implement and operationalize solutions that serve the entire organization. Glenn’s career includes executive leadership roles at major global corporations including EchoStar/DISH Network/HUGHES/Sling TV, Acumen Digital, Time Warner Cable, Charter Communications, Ball Corporation/Ball Aerospace, CSG International, BMW, Gates Rubber Company, and Lockheed Martin Corporation. Glenn has managed large enterprise corporate information technology teams in operations, integration, implementation, delivery, and support for successful global integrations of AWS (SlingTV/Acumen Digital and others), Oracle ERP EBS, Oracle Fusion Middleware (BEA), Oracle Fusion Cloud, Fusion Analytics, Hyperion, NetSuite, SAP ERP ECC HANNA, Workday HCM, Salesforce.com, B/OSS including Amdocs, Convergys, & CSG International. Glenn combines the unique background of having been a direct report to the President & Global Chief Information/Digital Officer of a major international corporation as well as a direct report to the CEO of an enterprise software engineering company.
data.text:
Glenn Iwata is the Vice President of Enterprise Systems Integrations.

He is responsible for flawless and frictionless implementation of artius.iD’s solutions for our emerging enterprise global client portfolio. Glenn works with large enterprise corporate teams both internally and externally to thoughtfully and rapidly implement and operationalize solutions that serve the entire organization.

Glenn’s career includes executive leadership roles at major global corporations including EchoStar/DISH Network/HUGHES/Sling TV, Acumen Digital, Time Warner Cable, Charter Communications, Ball Corporation/Ball Aerospace, CSG International, BMW, Gates Rubber Company, and Lockheed Martin Corporation.

Glenn has managed large enterprise corporate information technology teams in operations, integration, implementation, delivery, and support for successful global integrations of AWS (SlingTV/Acumen Digital and others), Oracle ERP EBS, Oracle Fusion Middleware (BEA), Oracle Fusion Cloud, Fusion Analytics, Hyperion, NetSuite, SAP ERP ECC HANNA, Workday HCM, Salesforce.com, B/OSS including Amdocs, Convergys, & CSG International.

Glenn combines the unique background of having been a direct report to the President & Global Chief Information/Digital Officer of a major international corporation as well as a direct report to the CEO of an enterprise software engineering company.
